item.title: Profit from the growth of international e-commerce
item.description: The love of shopping no longer knows national boundaries.
item.dc:creator: prestashop-partners

item.title: Meet Giuseppe, Ambassador of the month | August 2017
item.description: Giuseppe is our Ambassador in Battipaglia, Italy, and has been pretty active recently. He organized meetups regularly in his area and is always ready to help the PrestaShop Community.
item.dc:creator: Manon Plommet

item.title: Focus on Italian e-commerce
item.description: Italy’s e-commerce growth rate in sales reached 18% in 2016, its customer base of e-shoppers has now reached 18 million people, and the average basket is growing: Itali
item.dc:creator: vMartelli

item.title: Meet Nicolas, Ambassador of the month | July 2017
item.description: CreaNico is our Ambassador in Montpellier, France, and is very active in the region.
item.dc:creator: Manon Plommet

item.title: Back to school, Black Friday, Christmas: Download your end-of-year e-commerce guide
item.description: Back to school, Black Friday, Christmas—most e-commerce revenue will be made a few months from now. The challenge is on…starting now!
item.dc:creator: Cécile Dubouis

item.title: Timeline and tips for creating effective promotions on PrestaShop
item.description: Summer, Back to School, Black Friday, Christmas... End-of-year sales are vital to e-commerce, but preparing them can take up a lot of valuable time.
item.dc:creator: Cécile Dubouis

item.title: Meet Claudia, Ambassador of the month | June 2017
item.description: Claudia is our Ambassador in Monterrey, Mexico, and is a very regular meetup organizer in her city. She’s always ready to give a talk about PrestaShop!
item.dc:creator: Manon Plommet

item.title: 10 years - 10 “portrait” interviews: Geoffrey Bruyère, co-founder of a PrestaShop e-store
item.description: The pitch / The men’s fashion blog BonneGueule is also celebrating its 10th anniversary in 2017.
item.dc:creator: Mpierrot

item.title: Nine modules to quickly increase store traffic
item.description: As successful as your store may be, you’ll never ship any items without visitors. Luckily, it’s possible to increase traffic without dedicating days upon days to this time-consuming task!
item.dc:creator: Cécile Dubouis
